go_data.justification: Rabenosyn-5 is recruited to early endosomes in a phosphatidylinositol-3-kinase-dependent fashion.
Rabenosyn-5 interacts with hVPS45, a Sec1-like protein.
Rabenosyn-5 is required for fusion of plasma membrane-derived CCVs with the early endosomes.
Rabenosyn-5 is involved in trafficking of newly synthesized proteins through early endosomes en route to lysosomes.
Rabenosyn-5 colocalizes with EEA1 on early endosomes in A431 cells.
